sourcesContent:
Recent posts

{{ thread.createdBy }} posted on {{ thread.threadCreatedAt | date: 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm' }}

{{ thread.threadTitle }}

{{ thread.threadBody | slice: 0:75 }} (…)

{{ thread.threadComments?.length }} replies

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ThreadService } from '../threads/threads.service'; import { Thread } from '../threads/threads'; // Adjust the path accordingly @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['../../css/IndexStyle.css','../../css/thread_table.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { threads: Thread[] = []; constructor(private threadService: ThreadService) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.loadThreads(); } loadThreads() { this.threadService.getThreads().subscribe( (threads: Thread[]) => { this.threads = threads; }, (error) => { console.error('Error fetching threads', error); } ); } redirectToCreatePage() { window.location.href = '/Thread/Create'; } }
